title: Attack Vector
description: A c++ game made with SFML. A Maze runner developd in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2015.

title: Jetpack Kiwi
description: A 2.5D platformer tech demo developed in Unreal Engine 4.

title: Baaalrog
description: A java game made with LibGDX, A top-down, action-adventure game developed in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2016

title: L-System Tree
description: An OpenGL implementation of procedurally generated L-Systems

title: SPH fluid solver
description: OpenGL implementation of an SPH fluid solver

title: Deep Beat
description: A game made over the course of a month in Javascript, with a library called EaselJS. A rhythm/tower-defense hybrid game

title: Power Tower
description: Made in JavaScript inside of Intel's new XDK environment. A mobile, tower-defense game made in 24 hours for Intel's Hackathon
